AndroidConversion.AndroidUpgradeDef.label: Vanometric Cell
AndroidConversion.AndroidUpgradeDef.description: Miniature version of the Vanometric Powercell. When installed it frees the Android of the need for both energy and food. Truly the ultimate upgrade.\n-- "Power Overwhelming."

AndroidConversion.AndroidUpgradeDef.label: Mechanite Hive
AndroidConversion.AndroidUpgradeDef.description: Thumb sized devices placed throughout the body containing self maintaining factories of mechanites. Acts much like human blood when its exposed to the air and plugs any holes it detects.\n-- "I feel nothing!"

AndroidConversion.AndroidUpgradeDef.label: Psychic Attunement
AndroidConversion.AndroidUpgradeDef.description: By utilizing a material which got the opposite effect of psychic foil so can the mind and body of the android become a attractor for psionic forces. Why you would want to do this without the presence of fantastical forces like Magic on the RimWorld is beyond many scientists.\n-- "I only need my mind to take you down."
